articles.title: SARS-CoV-2 virus can change its shape to improve survival: Singapore study - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Scientists here have made an important discovery about the shape and structure of the SARS-CoV-2 virus' genetic material that can help in producing more effective drugs to treat Covid-19.
